item.description:
Hey boys,
Traditional Friday night meetup to game New Haven on May15th. We will start out with dinner at Nikkita to go over some basics, get social with the girls there and get in the right mindset to bounce to somewhere else in New Haven.
Possible second spots to hit up could be Bar, Geronimos or Playwright. We can decide this depending on how the night is going.
Any questions, let me know.

Please keep in mind that at the end of the month, non-participating memebers will be given notice that they may be deleted from the Connecticut Wingmen. Please make sure to RSVP to ensure this does not happen to you.
item.how_to_find_us: Look at my picture . Call the cell if needed 203 410 6861
item.name: Friday Night - May 15th - New Haven
